class.name: ros2_control_demo_hardware/RRBotSystemPositionOnlyHardware
class.description: The ros2_control RRbot example using a system hardware interface-type and only one command and state interface. This example is the starting point to implement a hardware interface for robots providing one communication path for all its joints.
